channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Critic of Universities Is Rallying to Defend Them in the Trump Era
item.description: The Foundation for Individual Rights and Expression has long been a critic of progressive campus culture. Now it’s taking on new, and surprising, targ...

item.title: Thai court acquits ex-Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra of royal defamation charge
item.description: Thailand's former Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra was acquitted of a royal defamation charge by a court on Friday, in a case that could have sent hi...

item.title: Famine confirmed in northern Gaza, says U.N.-backed agency
item.description: Famine has been officially declared in northern Gaza, a U.N.-backed group warns — marking the first such confirmation in the Middle East.

item.title: Gaza City and Surrounding Areas Officially Hit by Famine, Global Group Says
item.description: At least half a million people in the enclave were facing the most severe conditions measured by U.N.-backed international experts: starvation, acute ...

item.title: U.N.-backed panel confirms famine in Gaza. And, DOJ to send Congress some Epstein docs
item.description: A U.N.-backed panel of experts has declared that northern Gaza is suffering from famine. And, the DOJ is expected to release to Congress the first wav...

item.title: Jerome Powell Suggests Fed Will Soon Cut Interest Rates in Jackson Hole Speech
item.description: Jerome H. Powell said the “balance of risks” across the economy had started to shift, raising the odds the central bank lowers borrowing costs at its ...

item.title: These programs help poor students with college. Trump wants to pull the funding
item.description: For 60 years, TRIO has helped millions of people along the path to a degree, but the administration says it is no longer needed.

item.title: FBI searches home of former Trump adviser John Bolton
item.description: The FBI said its search of Bolton's home was authorized by a court, but declined to provide further details. Bolton is a frequent critic of the presid...

item.title: ‘No Meeting Planned’ Between Putin and Zelensky, Top Russian Diplomat Says
item.description: It was the clearest sign yet that President Trump’s push for an imminent summit was faltering.

item.title: Former Sri Lankan President Ranil Wickremesinghe Arrested on Corruption Charges
item.description: The ex-leader, Ranil Wickremesinghe, was arrested amid government investigations into widespread bribery and graft.

item.title: Collapsing Boundaries
item.description: We look at the relationship between digital stars and their followers.
